name: A GLITCHORROR :)
description:
STORY:

Alex was the best student to Information Technology until some other student called Mike was the best.Alex was so jealous so he decided to do something very bad.He add viruses in Mike's projects.Cameras caught Alex,so Alex left school for this.Then he went to another school.When he grown up he was a game developer.He was unknown at the time.Then Alex when he was at a bathroom,some other boys bullied him.These boys was his old bullies from his old school.Alex went to his home very sad.After some days his mom died.He was so sad.After some months he failed at a game jam that he joined.His game was so bad rated.He was in a serious depression.His father was died when he was young,so he was alone.Only his friend can help him.Then from his depression,he decide to make a game.This game was so confusing that no one can understand the point or the reason why the game was made.After some days he decided to share his game.He shared his game at Steam,Gamejolt and Itch.io with the username AlexDude123334524A23.After some months his friend Denis decided to go to Alex's home.Then Alex killed his friend for no reason.Then he commit suicide.After some days police found the bodies but,something was wrong.A police guard looked at Alex's computer.He was shocked.The game opened by itself.The guard decided to check that game.He just clicked to the start button but,something was wrong again.The text changed from START to HE IS WATCHING YOU.Then the guard started playing.The game was so boring so he decided to give up,but when the game was over,the guard died.Police was so confused.Police found Alex's Account,but something was wrong again.The game updated after Alex died.Police said that maybe some hacker did it but,Alex was using strong anivirus and other things.Alex's soul was in the game forever.The guard died,lives in the game too as the main player (the white figure).

Controls:

Space to flash

W,A,S,D to move

A game for the >NO_SIGNAL Game Jam.
